preface.title: Introduction
preface.para: The Dataphor DAC Developer's guide provides architecture and reference information for the Dataphor Data Access Components. This book describes how to utilize and extend the DAC and also provides detailed reference information. The reader should already be familiar with common object oriented programming concepts, as well as basic concepts specific to working with Microsoft Visual Studio .NET. It is also important that the reader be comfortable with basic database systems concepts and terminology.
